channel.title: Help with maps
channel.description: Hello Mopar, I'm currently using a source that was released called "Ruse-PS". It's came to my notice that the maps aren't either fully loading, or, they're just not completely added. Only half of the dungeoneering area is loaded, it shows a black area for the non-loaded one and looks really... odd.. Do I need to update the maps or what? I'm trying to make this not another leech of Ruse, and if I get the maps fully working correctly, I actually have a lot of ideas. I'm horrible client sided however.. If I do have to add the maps, how would I go about doing this, and could somebody please link me to the correct maps link? Thanks.

item.title: Help with maps
item.dc:creator: @skiller8860 skiller8860
item.description:
@skiller8860 wrote:

Hello Mopar, I’m currently using a source that was released called “Ruse-PS”. It’s came to my notice that the maps aren’t either fully loading, or, they’re just not completely added. Only half of the dungeoneering area is loaded, it shows a black area for the non-loaded one and looks really… odd… Do I need to update the maps or what? I’m trying to make this not another leech of Ruse, and if I get the maps fully working correctly, I actually have a lot of ideas. I’m horrible client sided however… If I do have to add the maps, how would I go about doing this, and could somebody please link me to the correct maps link? Thanks.

Read full topic
